column4: one more question, can Ubuntu (with samba) make Network drives like you find in a Bussines-environment?
Like you find on work, allways caled like X: Y: Z: and so :)
That part of things is normally done on the client side. On the server (samba) side they are all just network shares.
A good place to start is with the "man smb.conf" document, very informative
